text: Departure of a Grand Old Man () is a 1912 Russian silent drama movie directed by Yakov Protazanov and Elizaveta Thiman.Уход великого старца (Жизнь Л.Н. Толстого)Уход великого старца It stars Olga Petrova, Vladimir Shaternikov, and Leo Tolstoy. ==Actors== * Olga Petrova as Sofia Tolstaya * Vladimir Shaternikov as Leo Tolstoy * Leo Tolstoy * Mikhail Tamarov as Vladimir Chertkov * Elizaveta Thiman as Alexandra Lvovna Tolstaya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1912 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:Movies directed by Yakov Protazanov
title: Departure of a Grand Old Man
